comment_body:
I always liked stories that portrait the end of the world. This one was inspired by a scene from the anime Bleach. In an early episode a giant hollow enters the human world via a hole torn in the sky and after it's defeated it closes it like it's a curtain. Somehow that scene stuck with me...

If you enjoyed this story check out my [**author page**](https://rehnwriter.com/) and also check out all of my talented friends at [**r/TheCrypticCompendium**](https://www.reddit.com/r/TheCrypticCompendium/).
